desc: Brooklyn’s Tub & Scrub company makes luxury handmade soap & body products. From goats milk soaps, men’s soaps & products, Moroccan soap, charcoal soap for face & body, sensitive skin soap, essential oils, wholesale bulk soap, coffee scrubs, bath bombs, lotions, eco-friendly company, hand crafted, kid owned business

layout.text: High end ingredients used to bring you better products into your home. Every product made with you in mind.
